challenge.title: Step 21
challenge.description: Now modify my_graph['B'] into a list of tuples, where the first element in the tuple is the connected node, and the second element is the distance. The B-C distance is 4.

tests.text: my_graph['B'] should be a list containing the tuples ('A', 3) and ('C', 4).
tests.testString:
({ test: () => assert(runPython(`
    tuples = [("A", 3), ("C", 4)]
    len(my_graph["B"]) == 2 and all(t in my_graph["B"] for t in tuples)
  `))
})

({ test: () => assert(runPython(`    
    key_list = ["A", "B", "C", "D"]
    len(my_graph) == 4 and all(key in my_graph for key in key_list)
  `))
})

challengeFiles.name: main
